definitions.definition: To make a low, growling or rumbling noise, like a hungry stomach or certain animals.
To complain ; to murmur or mutter with discontent; to make ill-natured complaints in a low voice and a surly manner.
examples: He grumbles about the food constantly, but has yet to learn to cook.

definitions.definition: To utter in a grumbling fashion.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To make a low, growling or rumbling noise, like a hungry stomach or certain animals.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive ) To complain ; to murmur or mutter with discontent; to make ill-natured complaints in a low voice and a surly manner.
( transitive ) To utter in a grumbling fashion.
